001package aufgabe5;
002
003/**
004 * More specific note.
005 */
006public class Fachnote {
007
008    /**
009     * Subject of this Fachnote.
010     */
011    public String fach;
012
013    /**
014     * Grade of this Fachnote.
015     */
016    public Note note;
017
018    /**
019     * Create new Fachnote object.
020     * @param fach that this Fachnote belongs to
021     * @param note of the fach
022     */
023    public Fachnote(String fach, Note note) {
024        if (fach == null || note == null || note.intValue() == 0) {
025            throw new IllegalArgumentException();
026        }
027        this.fach = fach;
028        this.note = note;
029    }
030}
